name: William Lloyd Lauffer
label: SaaS Problem-Solver
summary: Iâ€™m a SaaS professional with a passion for solving complex problems, optimizing processes, and driving growth. With a background that spans Revenue Operations, Customer Success, and Sales Engineering, I thrive in fast-paced startup environments where I can wear multiple hats and make an impact.

work_experience.summary: Led onsite QBRs for GTM teams, aligning sales, customer success, and enablement on customer adoption trends and initiatives.
highlights: Analyzed customer health metrics to identify intervention needs, collaborating with GTM teams to mitigate churn and drive expansion.
Owned enablement programs, ensuring GTM teams had the necessary resources and knowledge to effectively drive customer engagement and expansion.
Designed onboarding frameworks to expedite time-to-value, serving as an SME to improve customer ramp-up processes.
Refined customer segmentation, pipeline visibility, and forecasting accuracy with sales, RevOps, and product teams.
Optimized GTM tech stack to ensure seamless workflows and customer engagement improvement.
Proactively identified customer pain points by analyzing health metrics, collaborating with GTM teams to implement early intervention strategies that reduced churn and improved adoption.
Contributed to the delivery of the annual SKO event, curating content and coordinating post-event training.
Developed scalable support resources, including self-service documentation, knowledge bases, and training materials, to enhance customer enablement and reduce support tickets.

work_experience.summary: Managed a $10M ARR portfolio, increasing retention by 20% and expanding NRR by 115%.
highlights: Reduced churn risk by 30%, securing $500K through proactive customer intervention strategies.
Led QBRs & EBRs aligning customer goals with the product roadmap to drive retention and expansion.
Drove higher adoption of new features through structured success plans and tailored training.
Identified and executed expansion opportunities, working closely with Sales for upsells and renewals.
Led on-site customer success engagements and attended industry events to strengthen client relationships and promote best practices.
Partnered with sales and finance teams to support renewals, upsells, and procurement cycle planning for enterprise customers.

Led the development of the Pooled Scale Team, creating a structured, scalable support model that improved response times and customer engagement while ensuring team accountability for key performance metrics.

work_experience.summary: Held full accountability for a $4M ARR portfolio, driving 115% NRR growth by proactively identifying upsell opportunities and strengthening customer relationships.
highlights: Scaled the CS team from 1 to 5 members, enhancing team performance through structured onboarding.
Designed engagement frameworks, reducing onboarding time by 40% and accelerating customer workflows.
Led technical enablement, ensuring seamless integration of product features for enterprise customers.
Implemented health score monitoring and intervention strategies to mitigate churn risk.
Led on-site customer success engagements and attended industry events to strengthen client relationships and promote best practices.
Designed scalable support frameworks by creating comprehensive help documentation, FAQs, and user training programs, improving customer self-sufficiency.

work_experience.summary: Led business operations for a $20M entity, driving revenue growth and efficiency through optimized go-to-market strategies.
highlights: Drove $5M in contracts by enhancing sales and marketing execution across K-12 districts.
Aligned business functions to improve customer retention, efficiency, and revenue growth.
Optimized sales and marketing execution, refining pricing models and customer acquisition strategies.
Fostered leadership development, mentoring department heads in a culture of innovation and accountability.

work_experience.summary: Increased student success rates by 35% by implementing personalized intervention strategies and providing academic and emotional support.
highlights: Developed and taught an all-inclusive GED-focused curriculum, helping at-risk students gain the skills and confidence needed to graduate.
Provided one-on-one mentorship to address academic struggles, build confidence, and support students through social and emotional challenges.
Collaborated with families, social workers, and community organizations to create a strong support network that fostered long-term student success.
